titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 1158.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 1158.

action.text: Mrs. Lowey asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 1158 (Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2020) to amend the title of the bill.
